long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Phi AI for Pega is a Chrome extension designed specifically for Pega developers and users. It excels at analyzing critical logic issues in Pega code, such as activities and data transforms, helping you catch and resolve potential problems before they impact your system. The extension also suggests relevant code comments, making your code more understandable and maintainable. Additionally, it can summarize rule-related information and answer all your Pega domain-specific questions, providing you with the insights you need to work efficiently. Install Î¦ AI for Pega to streamline your development process and enhance the quality of your Pega applications.


Analyzes Critical Logic Issues: Identifies and resolves issues in Pega code, including activities and data transforms, to ensure smooth operations.

Suggests Code Comments: Provides intelligent suggestions for code comments, enhancing code readability and maintainability.

Summarizes Rule-Related Information: Quickly summarizes relevant Pega rules, saving time and effort in understanding complex logic.

Answers Pega Domain-Specific Questions: Offers instant answers to your Pega-related queries, improving productivity and decision-making.

Enhances Development Process: Streamlines your workflow, making Pega development more efficient and error-free.
